NPL.title: Debt Restructuring Services
NPL.description: Get a fresh start with confidence. Professional debt restructuring solutions tailored to your needs.
NPL.servicesDescription: Comprehensive debt restructuring solutions designed to help you regain financial stability.
NPL.debtProcessDesc: Step-by-step guidance through the debt restructuring process.
NPL.calculatorDesc: Calculate your new payment terms and monthly installments.
NPL.consultationDesc: Book a consultation with our debt restructuring specialists.
NPL.successStoriesDescription: Real stories from customers who successfully restructured their debt.
NPL.testimonial1: BAM helped me restructure my debt and get back on track financially. The process was smooth and professional.
NPL.testimonial2: Thanks to BAM's debt restructuring program, I was able to reduce my monthly payments and regain financial stability.
NPL.registerConsultationFreeDesc: Every concern matters to us — we’ll get back to you as quickly as possible.
NPL.debtorIDInstructions: You can find your debtor ID in letters or emails sent to you by BAM.
NPL.requestConsentPersonalData: Request for consent to collect and use personal data
NPL.privacyPolicyStrictlyAdhered: Your information will be kept confidential and used only for contact and services. BAM strictly adheres to its privacy policy.
NPL.consentProductService: Consent to use data for product and service recommendations (required)
NPL.consentAnalysisDevelopment: Consent to use data for product or service analysis and development (required)
NPL.consentMarketing: Consent to use data for sending news, messages, emails, or other communications from the company
NPL.consentSatisfactionSurvey: Consent to use data for satisfaction surveys to improve services

NPA.title: Non-Performing Assets
NPA.description: Discover quality properties at competitive prices. Find your next investment opportunity today.
NPA.searchDescription: Use our advanced search filters to find the perfect property for your needs.
NPA.featuredDescription: Handpicked properties with excellent investment potential.
NPA.howItWorksDescription: Simple steps to purchase non-performing assets through BAM.
NPA.step1Description: Search and filter properties based on your preferences.
NPA.step2Description: Apply for the property with required documentation.
NPA.step3Description: Finalize the purchase and transfer ownership.

Footer.getLatestNews: Enter your email to receive latest news and activities from us
Footer.companyName: Bangkok Asset Management Public Company Limited
Footer.companyAddress: 99 Surasak Road, Silom, Bang Rak, Bangkok 10500
Footer.allRightsReserved: © 2025 Bangkok Asset Management Public Company Limited. All rights reserved.

Index.welcome_badge: 🚀 Welcome to the Future of Web Development
Index.welcome_description: An example website built with Next.js and TailwindCSS for modern web application development that is cutting-edge and efficient
Index.features_description: Discover the capabilities that make BAM stand out from the competition
Index.fast_description: Built with Next.js for maximum performance with SSR and Static Generation
Index.easy_description: Designed with simple UI/UX, easy to use and accessible for everyone
Index.creative_description: Opens opportunities to showcase creativity with modern development tools
Index.getting_started_description: Follow these simple steps to begin your journey with BAM
Index.step1_description: Download and install the project, then run the dev server to start development
Index.step2_description: Use the provided tools to customize and develop features according to your needs
Index.step3_description: When ready, deploy your project and launch it to the online world

About.title: About BAM
About.description: We are a team dedicated to creating modern websites and applications
About.vision_description: We believe technology can change the world for the better by creating digital products that are user-friendly and efficient. We strive to create the best experience for every user.
About.mission_description: Develop modern, fast, and responsive web applications that meet user needs in the digital age. Use the latest technology to create high-quality solutions.
About.cta_title: Ready to Start a New Project?
About.cta_description: Let's create something new and exciting together
About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

AwardsAchievements.awards_detail: Reflecting our commitment and work standards through recognized awards and achievements

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.question1: What type of business does BAM operate?
FAQ.answer1: BAM operates in the field of non-performing asset management, helping debtors and solving financial institution problems. We help rehabilitate real estate businesses by developing potential properties for sale to become standard products that are in demand in the market.
FAQ.question2: What are the contact numbers for BAM head office and customer service center?
FAQ.answer3: Monday - Friday: 08:30 - 17:30. Saturday - Sunday and public holidays: Closed

CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_description: It is a key organisation in asset recovery. Helping to drive the sustainable growth of the Thai economy and society.
CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_sub_description: Our operational guidelines for reaching our organisation's goals
CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_box_1: Manage and rehabilitate non-performing assets to return them to the economic system.
CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_box_2: Build a network of partners to expand your business and customer base in a coordinated and integrated manner.
CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_box_3: Supervise business operations under the principles of environmental and societal care, and good governance to drive the economy and society sustainably.
CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_box_4: Apply new technology and innovation to support change.
CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_box_5: Elevate products and services for customers and all sectors.
CorporateVisionMission.corporate_vision_mission_box_6: Train personnel to be experts and develop the organisation with new ideas.
